author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Abdul Salam Asanaru Pillai (trading as South Kerala Cashew Exporters) v Nomanbhoy & Sons Pte Ltd
counsel: Tan Teng Muan and Loh Li Qin (Mallal & Namazie) for the plaintiff; Lawrence Teh Kee Wee, Derek Kang Yu Hsien, Jeannette Lim and Ng Hui Min (Rodyk & Davidson LLP) for the defendant; Sarbjit Singh and Suja Sasidharan (Lim & Lim) for the second defendant in counterclaim
